mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.gender, u.telephone, u.create_time createTime, d.id deptId, d.name deptName, r.id rId, r.name roleName FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.uid LEFT JOIN department d ON ud.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.uid LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.rid

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.gender, u.telephone, u.create_time createTime, ur.rid, ud.dept_id deptId FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.uid LEFT JOIN user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.uid WHERE u.id=#{id}
